title: Did you remove Fox's news from the Armed Forces Radio on the Fendaman part?
subtitle: Fox News was criticized for part of the testimony of Lieutenant Colonel Alexander Fendman during the investigation into the isolation of President Donald Trump of the United States.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Fox News was transferred from "Armed Forces Radio" because of the network's coverage of Lieutenant Colonel Alexander Fendman's testimony in the investigation into the isolation of United States President Donald Trump.
